about-page.title: About me
about-page.p1: I'm Jes√∫s Lugo, video game developer and web programmer. Since I was 15 years old I have been studying self-taught and experimenting with different engines such as Unity or Gamemaker Studio.
about-page.p2: I am currently a student of web application development at the IES Telesforo Bravo, in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain, and I keep enriching my knowledge with my personal projects using Godot Engine.
about-page.p3: I love creating and living experiences; a need that I have nurtured with video games since I was a child. My favorite experiences are Red Dead Redemption 2, Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice, Bloodborne, Minecraft, and Cult of the Lamb.
about-page.p4: Right now I am available for job opportunities, so if you are interested in an enthusiast of creativity, suspense and unforgettable experiences, do not hesitate to contact ;)
